case_data.name: EEOC v. DIAMANN HEATING & AIR CONDITIONING
case_data.plaintiff_description: Equal Employment Opportunity Commission, on behalf of one or more workers.
settlement_agreement: Court Approved Settlement or Consent Decree
case_data.summary: In September 1999, the San Francisco office of the EEOC brought this suit against Diamann Heating & Air Conditioning and Konocti Harbor Resort & Spa in the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of California. The claimant intervened in the suit in January 2000. The case settled by entry of a consent decree in May 2001. Because the docket is the only accessible document, there is no more information available pertaining to the nature of the suit or the consent decree.
